author: cmpilato
msg: Documentation fixes.
Patch by: C. Scott Ananian <cananian@alumni.princeton.edu>
* adds.texi
Correct a typo: when commiting 'fonts' in the example, the
second file added should be 'file2' not 'file1'.
* dirversioning.texi
Correct the attribution of a quote; fix the spelling of 'contradictory'.

author: joe
msg: Use a second ne_session for GET requests so updates work.
* ra_dav.h (svn_ra_session_t): Add a second ne_session pointer.
* session.c (svn_ra_get_authenticator): Initialize the second session.
* fetch.c (simple_fetch_file): Use the second session.

author: kevin
msg: Another try at fixing the db in tree build.  Won't affect --disable-shared
builds, but should fix shared builds.

author: cmpilato
msg: * main.c
(usage, main): Rename 'rmtxn' subcommand to 'rmtxns' and allow
multiple transaction names on the command-line.

author: sussman
msg: Hot backup script changes.
We're going to run it as a post-commit hook, along with the mail
script.  In addition to backing up the repository, it uses a
write-lock file to "clean" (remove) obsolete logfiles.  (This locking
guards against the case where two commits happen very close together,
whereby the removing of old log files may interfere with another
process' attempt to back them up.)
